title: Punnagai Ramayanam
subTitle: A religious leader explains the various reasons behind the smile of the deity Kothandaramar, an utsavar of Lord Rama, at the Kothandaramar Temple.

title: Sringeri Vaibhavam
subTitle: A religious leader delivers an insightful discourse on the teachings of the Almighty and holy scriptures, and discusses ways to live a righteous and blessed life.

title: Namasankeertanam
subTitle: Devotees gather as various talented singers and musicians perform soul-stirring songs and melodious hymns in praise of the Almighty to invoke the spirit of devotion.

title: Pillyar Petti
subTitle: The host narrates stories from Hindu mythology, diving into its origins while shedding light on the importance of following the age-old culture.
